Name: Volcanic Rifle
Description:
This is a Rifle version of the Volcanic Pistol, it features a Model 8 scope attachment if you want to try to take down a paper target a hundred meters away
And have you ever noticed how difficult it is to shoot down a sosig with a Volcanic pistol? Do you ever wanted more than 8 shots? Say no more! This Rifle version of the Volcanic don't contains only 20 nor 30 rounds but a whopping 24 rounds!
ShortDescription: Rifle version of the Volcanic Pistol
